attributes.action: urge TfL not to reintroduce the AM contraflow in the Blackwall Tunnel due to Health and Safety considerations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For 29 years the residents of North and East London have suffered huge amounts of traffic congestion in the rush hour morning peaks when heading south bound into South East London and Kent. Additionally due to the dangerous antics of a few drivers the lives of those drivers have been put at risk on numerous occasions whilst in the Southbound bore when the contraflow was in use. Finally the authorities have seen sense and stopped the daily Russian Roulette saga of will we make it alive though the tunnel unscathed and with minimal delays.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
